trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that identify an item of content.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组有序的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> 元素，这些元素用于标识内容的项。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> 元素中定义<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>提供一种结构化的方式来引用外部数据项目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 的可修改深层复制克隆。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 的可修改深层复制克隆。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A>方法创建的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A>隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
trans-unit.target: 克隆<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>属性将为`false`即使此源<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>属性是 `true.`

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A>复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析） 但不复制动画或当前的动画值。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 有关架构的详细信息，请参阅[批注架构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 有关架构的详细信息，请参阅[批注架构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.GetSchema%2A> is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.GetSchema%2A> 提供要满足的协定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that make up this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取组成此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that make up this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 组成此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>返回的集合将永远不会为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>不包含任何<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>对象，则返回的集合将包含零个元素。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader to use to deserialize the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 进行反序列化的 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> from a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 反序列化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The serialized XML for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 的序列化 XML 无效。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to use to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 进行序列化的 XML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> 序列化为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
